      • findRecentAudits

        java.util.List<SiteSearchAudit> findRecentAudits(java.lang.String jobId,
                                               int offset,
                                               int limit)
                                                 throws DotDataException
        Retrieves a list of most recent audits for the specified jobId. It orders by "fireDate desc"
        Parameters:
        jobId - job identifier
        row - skip count
        maximum - audit count to return
        Returns:
        list of SiteSearchAudit
        Throws:
        DotDataException
